titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL425
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL425

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

1.[Rathad ... ...] and hi[s] brother 2.[Wahab]ʾawwām and his sons Sa= 3.ʿdʾawwām [and ʾAbīkarib and Wahabʾīl of the lineage of Dhū- 4.Maḥfad]ān, the Raymānites, vassals of [the king, have] erected a stele [for 5.their lord, the master of] Ḥarrānum, as they had [pro]mised him, [wh= 6.en] they had laid out the fields of their land of Dhū-Maḥfa[d= 7.ān. And] verily the field[s] were indeed protected. [And may he grant] 8.them bountiful, healthy c[rop]s and prod[uce]. 9.[By] ʾĪlmuquh, master of Ḥarrānum.

Rathad and his brother
Wahabʾawwām and his sons Sa=
ʿdʾawwām and ʾAbīkarib and Wahabʾīl of the lineage of Dhū-
Maḥfadān, the Raymānites, vassals of the king, have erected a stele for
their lord, the master of Ḥarrānum, as they had promised him, wh=
en they had laid out the fields of their land of Dhū-Maḥfad=
ān. And verily the fields were indeed protected. And may he grant
them bountiful, healthy crops and produce.
By ʾĪlmuquh, master of Ḥarrānum.

Rathad and his brother
Wahabʾawwām and his sons Sa=
ʿdʾawwām and ʾAbīkarib and Wahabʾīl of the lineage of Dhū-
Maḥfadān, the Raymānites, vassals of the king, have erected a stele for
their lord, the master of Ḥarrānum, as they had promised him, wh=
en they had laid out the fields of their land of Dhū-Maḥfad=
ān. And verily the fields were indeed protected. And may he grant
them bountiful, healthy crops and produce.
By ʾĪlmuquh, master of Ḥarrānum.

Rathad and his brother
Wahabʾawwām and his sons Sa=
ʿdʾawwām and ʾAbīkarib and Wahabʾīl of the lineage of Dhū-
Maḥfadān, the Raymānites, vassals of the king, have erected a stele for
their lord, the master of Ḥarrānum, as they had promised him, wh=
en they had laid out the fields of their land of Dhū-Maḥfad=
ān. And verily the fields were indeed protected. And may he grant
them bountiful, healthy crops and produce.
By ʾĪlmuquh, master of Ḥarrānum.
